A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I wanted to be blown away by this movie\, but just wasn't. It flowed too hastily and choppily in some areas and dragged on in others; the plot was a bit thin and\, without giving any spoilers\, I'll just say that too many story threads came to anticlimactic ends.  Temper your expectations before going into this one\, and may the force be with you.
